verses.verse: Not unto us <WH3068>, O Jehovah, not unto us <WH8034>, But unto thy name give <WH5414> glory <WH3519>, For thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, and for thy truth <WH571>'s sake.
Wherefore should the nations <WH1471> say <WH559>, Where is now their God <WH430>?
But our God <WH430> is in the heavens <WH8064>: He hath done <WH6213> whatsoever he pleased <WH2654>.
Their idols <WH6091> are silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, The work <WH4639> of men <WH120>'s hands <WH3027>.
They have mouths <WH6310>, but they speak <WH1696> not <WH5869>; Eyes have they <WH7200>, but they see not;
They have ears <WH241>, but they hear <WH8085> not <WH639>; Noses have they <WH7306>, but they smell not;
They have hands <WH3027>, but they handle <WH4184> not <WH7272>; Feet have they <WH1980>, but they walk not <WH1897>; Neither speak they through their throat <WH1627>.
They that make <WH6213> them shall be like unto them <WH982>; Yea, every one that trusteth in them.
O Israel <WH3478>, trust <WH982> thou in Jehovah <WH3068>: He is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.
O house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175>, trust <WH982> ye in Jehovah <WH3068>: He is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.
Ye that fear <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>, trust <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>: He is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath been mindful <WH2142> of us <WH1288>; He will bless us <WH1288>: He will bless the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; He will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175>.
He will bless <WH1288> them that fear <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>, Both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419>.
Jehovah <WH3068> increase <WH3254> you more and more <WH1121>, You and your children.
Blessed <WH1288> are ye of Jehovah <WH3068>, Who made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
The heavens <WH8064> are the heavens <WH8064> of Jehovah <WH3068>; But the earth <WH776> hath he given <WH5414> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
The dead <WH4191> praise <WH1984> not Jehovah <WH3050>, Neither any that go down <WH3381> into silence <WH1745>;
But we will bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3050> From this time forth and for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>. Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>.
